messages.title: Dear Voter,
messages.content: I don't have any left or right ideology, just common-sense solutions. My drive as your MP is making sure that you, the people of Nottingham South, have a representative that is willing to achieve that mantra. Someone who makes sure your has are taken before the many layers of Government that I want to trial for Education in Nottingham South. I will fight for those who's voices are not heard. Yours sincerely, David Hollas

keyPolicies.policyDescription: “To slash immigration and control the release of criminals onto our streets. Border and coastal security reinstated.
Rebuild our Armed Forces, 20,000 Soldiers, 10,000 GPs, Scrap Hospital parking fees.
Invest in the NHS rather than splashing billions abroad.
Ensuring hard-won rights are protected, defending strictly free speech.
Full Brexit. Reform the House of Lords. English parliament. Proportional representation.

issues.brexitEurope: Remaining in the crumbling European Union.
issues.education: Making you pay to see your GP.
issues.governance: Full Brexit. Reform the House of Lords. English parliament. Proportional representation

Remaining in the crumbling European Union.
Jeremy Corbyn and his Labour party are in a death spiral. They are the epitome of an Islington based clique. A vote for Labour is a vote for.
